Name: De Barderij
Review Text: Excellent bar with variety drinks. The bartender Ms. Alva is nice to talk to she makes the time to chat with customers. Quiet too which makes it easy to talk other customers.

Name: De Barderij
Review Text: It was my first time in Amsterdam and this was a very nice place to enjoy a beer, the stuff was so much friendly and also very nice to have conversation with!! I highly recommend it and hope to be there soon

Name: De Barderij
Review Text: Friendly staff. Reasonable selection of beer other than Heineken! Nice views of the canal from the back cubby. And on a good night you might find some eye candy!
